events.message: I recently received my order but the product is not as described and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's report contains keywords related to refund and return requests, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for handling the refund request and further communication.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and details about why you want a refund? This information will help us proceed quickly.
My order number is 1234567. The product was not the color I ordered, and it arrived with missing accessories, so I am disappointed.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for you. Please confirm if you'd like to proceed with the refund or prefer an exchange.
I appreciate your prompt response. Yes, I would like to proceed with the refund as soon as possible. Thank you.
We have processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
As there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need any more help.
